</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns shot information [[Array]] for the given projectile in format [vehicle, instigator], where vehicle is the vehicle the shot was fired from, and the instigator is the person who pulled the trigger. If shot was fired by a soldier on foot or in FFV position in vehicle, the soldier is returned for the vehicle. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[getShotParents]] projectile </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> projectile: [[Object]] - the actual projectile shot </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - [vehicle, instigator] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_shotParents = [[getShotParents]] myProjectile;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>batmobile [[addEventHandler]] ["Fired", {[[systemChat]] [[str]] [[getShotParents]] (_this [[select]] 6)}];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[setShotParents]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
